titleStmt.title: Two funeral sermons preached in St. Saviour's Church in Dartmouth Together with a preface, giving some account of the reasons, why they are now made publick. By Humfry Smith, M.A. and vicar there. Licens'd, Feb. 23. 1689/90. Z. Isham.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphry, b. 1654 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Charles Yeo, bookseller in Exon.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
